June 17, 2018 D Hebden Bridge Hymn Tune Contest
Hebden Bridge Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest Hebden Bridge March and Hymn Tune Contest hebden-bridge-march-hymn-tune-contest
None
Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire (See separate “March” result).
Combined: 1. Hammonds Saltaire, 98+97 - £400 and the Alan Bottomley Memorial Shield 2. Milnrow, 96+96 - £200 3. Marsden Silver, 95+94 4. Elland Silver, 93+93 5. Yorkshire Imperial DUT, 94+91 6. Uppermill, 91+90 7. Audley Brass, 90+89 8. Elland Silver Youth, 88+87 9. Littleborough, 87+86 10. Lindley, 85+88 11. Delph, 86+85 12. Hebden Bridge Junior, 84+84
Best Hymn: Hammonds - £50 1st Section: Lindley - £100 2nd Section: Delph - £100 3rd Section: Uppermill - £100 Youth: Elland Silver Youth - £100 Best Youth Instrumentalist: Daniel Clough (Cornet), Elland Silver Youth Best Road March: Yorkshire Imperial DUT - £25 Deportment: Milnrow - £25
